name: Achilles Vs Turtles
description:
Achilles vs turtles - is base defence game, where you aim is to defend your heel from turtles, coming from both sides. Each turtle has sweet spot, which one shot enemy if hit. 

Eliminating turtles will give you gold, which you could spend on various upgrades between runs like reload speed, clip size or fire rate.

Controls: 

  • Movement - WASD or arrow keys
  • Jump - spacebar
  • Shoot - mouse
This game is submission to PGD Jam #6 (29 june - 11 jule 2021) Theme: Achilles' heel
